reviewText:
I would highly recommend this 6 part DVD/CD to everyone ready to make a change in their overall health and wellness. This is great information that I did not know and plan to share with all my loved ones and friends. Just watched the first DVD with my husband and he found it very good information that also helped validate eating changes we had already began to make about 3 mos. ago.
Thank God for Jordin Rubin et al. You are literally helping to change the world.
